Starship Hospital nurse, Vickie Wade, couldn’t hear baby’s oxygen alarm while wearing headphones and using laptop https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nurse-vickie-wade-couldnt-hear-babys-oxygen-alarm-while-wearing-headphones-and-using-laptop/KPUQMLB7KVAJPJFGRVHQA7AYN4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nurse-vickie-wade-couldnt-hear-babys-oxygen-alarm-while-wearing-headphones-and-using-laptop/KPUQMLB7KVAJPJFGRVHQA7AYN4/ Jeremy WilkinsonAn alarm had been blaring for nearly half a minute but Vickie Wade didn't hear it. Eight Immigration NZ staffers put on leave amid investigation into ‘inappropriate’ Microsoft Teams conversations https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/eight-immigration-nz-staffers-placed-on-leave-amid-investigation-into-inproperty-microsoft-teams-conversations/DUPNNOGPOJCMHITKN5AUJYXKKA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/eight-immigration-nz-staffers-placed-on-leave-amid-investigation-into-inproperty-microsoft-teams-conversations/DUPNNOGPOJCMHITKN5AUJYXKKA/ Benjamin PlummerA company-wide email last week advised staff an investigation was under way. A car with a broken window is the focus of investigation. Photo / Isaac Davison
Live updates: Defiant Donald Trump recalls Secret Service killing gunman, Joe Biden urges unity https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/live-updates-donald-trump-arrives-in-wisconsin-biden-urges-unity-after-rally-shooting/7NY6H35LYZBYDPNIYNE55HMUSQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/live-updates-donald-trump-arrives-in-wisconsin-biden-urges-unity-after-rally-shooting/7NY6H35LYZBYDPNIYNE55HMUSQ/ Toluse Olorunnipa, Tyler PagerA bandage was briefly visible on Donald Trump's ear.Mon, 15 Jul 2024 06:56:37 +0000 BUTLER, PENNSYLVANIA - JULY 13: Republican presidential candidate former President Donald Trump pumps his fist as he is rushed offstage during a rally on July 13, 2024 in Butler, Pennsylvania. Butler County district attorney Richard Goldinger said the shooter is dead after injuring former U.S. President Donald Trump, killing one audience member and injuring another in the shooting. (Photo by Anna Moneymaker/Getty Images)
